name: OctaveWealth
headline: The 401(k) that helps you grow
description:
We’ll build the 401(k) you need to help attract and retain talent.

OctaveWealth is operated by Quillu Inc, an SEC registered Investment Advisor.

raw_markdown="[OctaveWealth](https://octavewealth.com/</>)
[Pricing](https://octavewealth.com/</#pricing>)[About](https://octavewealth.com/</about>)
[Login to Your Account](https://octavewealth.com/<https:/app.octavewealth.com/login>)
![](https://octavewealth.com/boat.jpeg)
# The 401(k) that helps you grow
We'll build the 401(k) you need to help attract and retain talent.
[Request Information](https://octavewealth.com/</invite>)[Login](https://octavewealth.com/<https:/app.octavewealth.com/login>)
## Some of our Happy Customers
> “The investment tools and education our employees get from OctaveWealth is second to none. They have the best platform we have seen.”
Max Salzberg
·
CEO, BackerKit
·
![CEO, BackerKit](https://octavewealth.com/_next/static/media/backerkit.887551dd.svg)
> “Huge fan of the UI and Support Staff! Setting up was easy vs Vanguard. My employees have all said the sign-up was straight-forward on their end as well!”
Tyler Pierce
·
President
·
![President](https://octavewealth.com/_next/static/media/turion.c06d46a7.png)
Hassle-free admin
    360 Payroll Integration and 3(16) fiduciary services like eligibility tracking, plan compliance, and Form 5500 included.
Powerful Tools
    Employees get personalized spending projections, shortfall tracking, and savings advice directly in their account.
Concierge Service
    A dedicated account manager will guide you through set-up, seamlessly transfer your current 401(k), and support you and your employees.
## We take care of your 401(k) plan so you can focus on your business.
  * 1
We design your plan & investment menu
  * 2
We connect to your payroll
  * 3
We enroll employees & provide financial education
  * 4
We invest plan assets, which are held at a qualified custodian
  * 5
We prepare notices & filings that can be sent with one click


![Screenshot of an OctaveWealth feature](https://octavewealth.com/_next/image?url=%2FhowItWorks-1.png&w=1080&q=75)
## We help your employees plan for retirement, so they can stay focused and happy.
Professionally Managed
    We are a team of engineers and investment professionals. We built portfolio management software for some of the largest asset manager and traded $6 billion daily for the largest pension funds.
Smart Investments
    Diversified investments personalized for each employee's risk profile helps them stay invested and save more for retirement.
Investment Fiduciary
    As the 3(38) Fiduciary, we select, manage, and monitor the investments with your employee's best interest in mind. We don't engage in revenue sharing with any fund companies.
Employee Education
    Employees get live retirement education sessions annually with investment professionals, and have access to retirement planning tools at anytime.
## Clear, affordable pricing. No predatory fees.
401(k)s don't have to be expensive.
Automated administration and retirement benefit expertise to help you attract and retain talent.
### What's included
  * Full Service 401(k)
  * Automated Administration
  * Dedicated Account Manager
  * 3(16) and 3(38) Fiduciary
  * 360 Payroll Integration
  * Employee Education
  * Personalized Retirement Planning
  * Low-cost Index Funds
  * Form 5500 Filings
  * Safekeeping of Assets


### Monthly Pricing
$200Base
$9Per Eligible
Avg fund fees: 0.07%
Annual Custody Fee: 0.03%
## Additional employee fees: 0%
Many providers charge employees 0.25-1.00% per year in additional fees, which erodes growth. An annual fee of 0.72% would cost over $1,000/year after 5 years for an employee contributing $10,000/year.
## Account Protection & Security
OctaveWealth uses state-of-the-art security measures when handling your information. Your sensitive personal information is fully encrypted and securely stored.
OctaveWealth is registered with the [Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC)](https://octavewealth.com/<https:/sec.gov/>). All investments are held in a secure trust in your name with a [third-party qualified custodian](https://octavewealth.com/<https:/www.sec.gov/resources-for-investors/investor-alerts-bulletins/investoralertsbulletincustodyhtm>). Our brokerage partner is a member of [Securities Investor Protection Corporation (SIPC)](https://octavewealth.com/<https:/www.sipc.org/>), which insures your company's account up to $500,000 (including $250,000 for claims for cash).
[More →](https://octavewealth.com/</learn#strength-and-security>)
[Contact Us](https://octavewealth.com/</contact>)
[About](https://octavewealth.com/</about>)
[Investing Methodology](https://octavewealth.com/</methodology>)
[Form ADV](https://octavewealth.com/</forms>)
[Privacy](https://octavewealth.com/</legal/privacy>)
[Terms](https://octavewealth.com/</legal/terms>)
This website is solely for informational purposes and is not intended to give individual tax, legal or investment planning advice. Any opinions expressed are relevant as of the posting date. All relevant facts, including individual circumstances, need to be considered by a reader to arrive at personal investment conclusions. There is no guarantee a participant's savings and investment strategy will provide adequate income at or through their retirement. Participants should carefully consider investment objectives, risks, fees and expenses carefully before investing. Past performance is not indicative of future results. Keep in mind that investing involves risks. The value of your investment will fluctuate over time and you may gain or lose money. Investment risks are born solely by the investor and not by OctaveWealth.
OctaveWealth provides links for your convenience to websites produced by other providers or industry related material. Accessing websites through links directs you away from our website. OctaveWealth is not responsible for errors or omissions in the material on third party websites, and does not necessarily approve of or endorse the information provided. Users who gain access to third party websites may be subject to the copyright and other restrictions on use imposed by those providers and assume responsibility and risk from use of those websites.
This site is designed for U.S. residents.
OctaveWealth is operated by Quillu Inc., a [SEC Registered Investment Advisor](https://octavewealth.com/<https:/adviserinfo.sec.gov/firm/summary/170975>).
14 Mint Plaza Ste #500 · San Francisco, Calif. 94103
© 2024 Quillu Inc.

generated_description:
### OctaveWealth Overview

**Company Name**: OctaveWealth  
**Founder**: Operated by Quillu Inc., an SEC registered Investment Advisor  
**Founded**: Date not specified  
**Location**: San Francisco, CA  
**Team Size**: 2 employees  
**Batch**: Part of Y Combinator Batch S12  

**Website**: [OctaveWealth](https://octavewealth.com)

---

### Mission Statement
At OctaveWealth, the goal is simple: **"The 401(k) that helps you grow."** They emphasize the importance of a well-structured 401(k) in attracting and retaining talent within companies.

---

### Services Offered
OctaveWealth designs and manages customized 401(k) plans to simplify retirement savings for companies and their employees. Here’s what they do:

1. **Plan & Investment Design**: They tailor the plan according to the company's needs.
2. **Payroll Integration**: Seamlessly connect the employee’s 401(k) with payroll systems.
3. **Employee Enrollment**: Help with onboarding employees and providing financial education.
4. **Investment Management**: Handle investments, ensuring they’re kept with a qualified custodian.
5. **Compliance and Reporting**: Manage necessary filings and notices easily.

#### Key Features:
- **Hassle-Free Administration**: Services include eligibility tracking and compliance support.
- **Employee Tools**: Personalized spending projections and savings advice.
- **Concierge Service**: Dedicated account managers ensure a smooth setup and ongoing support.

---

### Pricing Structure
- **Base Fee**: $200/month  
- **Per Eligible Employee**: $9/month  
- **Average Fund Fees**: 0.07%  
- **Annual Custody Fee**: 0.03%  
- **Employee Fees**: 0% (many competitors impose annual fees that hamper growth)  

Overall, OctaveWealth delivers a transparent, affordable, and efficient way to manage retirement plans.

---

### Customer Testimonials
Customers have praised OctaveWealth for their intuitive user interface and exceptional support. For instance:
- **Max Salzberg, CEO of BackerKit**, states, “The investment tools and education our employees get from OctaveWealth is second to none.”
- **Tyler Pierce, President**, noted, “Setting up was easy vs. Vanguard, and employees found sign-up straightforward.”

---

### Security & Compliance
OctaveWealth prioritizes security by employing state-of-the-art measures to protect sensitive information. They are registered with the SEC and utilize a third-party qualified custodian for asset safety, backed by SIPC insurance.

---

### Summary
In a nutshell, OctaveWealth stands out as a modern, user-friendly 401(k) solution designed not just for compliance but for genuine employee growth and satisfaction. Their approach combines automated processes with comprehensive support, ensuring that businesses can focus on what they do best while taking care of their employees' retirement needs. 

Check them out at [OctaveWealth](https://octavewealth.com) for more details!
